subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Nets Coach Lawrence Frank had to be restrained by one of his assistants as he left the court after officials failed to call a blocking foul on Rasheed Wallace when he bumped Vince Carter at the end of the game.
snippet: Nets Coach Lawrence Frank had to be restrained by one of his assistants as he left the court after officials failed to call a blocking foul on Rasheed Wallace when he bumped Vince Carter at the end of the game.
